description: Try our easy to follow Cumin Lentils With Yoghurt Dressing recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Lentil salad,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Cumin Lentils With Yoghurt Dressing Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 large raw beetroot, peeled and coarsely grated
1 Granny Smith apple, peeled and coarsely grated

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a frying pan and fry the red onions over a medium heat for about 8 minutes until soft and golden. Add the garlic and cumin seeds and cook for a further 5 minutes.
Mix the onion mixture into the lentils, season well and leave to cool.
Make the dressing by mixing together the ingredients in a small bowl.
Serve the cooled lentils on a bed of leaves, with the grated beetroot and apple (if used), a couple of spoonfuls of minty yoghurt and a generous squeeze of lemon juice.
